data.title: B Main To Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: Plant spike on B Default for a FRAG/MENT lineup to force defenders off of spike.

data.title: Caves to A Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: Plant spike on A Default for a FRAG/MENT lineup to force defenders off of spike.

data.title: A Cave Pop Flash For A Site
data.description: This is a great FLASH/DRIVE from A Cave to pop flash players holding most of the common angles inside of A Site, except for any close angles directly outside of A Cave on A Site.

data.title: Defender Spawn ZERO/POINT From B Back
data.description: This ZERO/POINT for Defender Spawn from B Back is almost impossible to destroy, and can give you and your teammates valuable information as you try to take control of / hold B Site.

data.title: Mid Bottom To Mid Nest ZERO/POINT
data.description: This ZERO/POINT lineup is primarily useful for gathering information on Mid Nest / suppressing a player oping there so that they can't use utility to get out of an unfavorable position.

data.title: B Back ZERO/POINT From Mid Cannon
data.description: This ZERO/POINT lineup is great for suppressing / gathering information on players in Back B Site, and potentially near the Pillar in the middle of Site as well. Keep in mind however, that this ZERO/POINT lineup does not suppress / scan the close left corner in B Back that you see as you come out of B Main.
